media:group.media:title: Putin's War Against Human Rights #shorts
media:group.media:description:
Vladimir Putin recently announced a “partial mobilization” order, commanding 300,000 Russian citizens to fight in the Ukraine war. Not only is this a violation of basic human rights, it’s a step backwards in human progress.
——————————
CREDITS:
Written by Sean W. Malone 
Narrated by Matt Tabor
Produced, and Edited by Michael Ozias
Assistant Edited by Abby Richardson
